extendedInfo.description: If you are Justin Bieber's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Justin Bieber's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Justin Bieber's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Justin Bieber's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :) -------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics -------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - My World - My World 2.0 - Never Say Never (The Remixes) - Under The Mistletoe - Believe -------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - All Around The World - All I Want For Christmas Is You - All I Want Is You - As Long As You Love Me - Baby - Baby ("My Worlds Acoustic" version) - Be Alright - Beauty And A Beat - Believe - Bigger - Born To Be Somebody - Boyfriend - Boyfriend (Remix) - Can't Live Without You - Catching Feelings - Christmas Eve - Christmas Love - Come Home To Me - Common Denominator - Die In Your Arms - Down To Earth - Dr. Bieber - Drummer Boy - Eenie Meenie - Fa La La - Fa La La (Acapella) - Fairytale - Fall - Favorite Girl - First Dance - Forever - Happy New Year - Heartache - Hey Girl - Home This Christmas - How To Love (Remix) - I Would - Just Like Them - Kiss & Tell - Latin Girl - Love Me - Love Me Like You Do - Make You Believe - Mama's Boy - Maria - Mi Amor - Mistletoe - Never Let You Go - Never Say Never - Old School Flow - Omaha Mall - One Less Lonely Girl - One Less Lonely Girl (French Adaptation) - One Love - One Time - Only Thing I Ever Get For Christmas - Otis (Freestyle) - Out Of Town Girl - Overboard - Overboard (Live) - Pick Me - Pray - Ride - Right Here - Runaway Love - Runaway Love (Remix) - Santa Claus Is Coming To Town - Set A Place At Your Table - She Don't Like The Lights - Silent Night - Somebody To Love - Somebody To Love (Remix) - Someday At Christmas - Speaking In Tongues - Stuck In The Moment - Swagg's Mean - Take You - That Should Be Me - That Should Be Me (Remix) - The Christmas Song (Chestnuts Roasting On An Open Fire) - Thinking About You - Thought Of You - Turn To You - U Smile - Uh Oh - Up - Up (Remix) - Where Are You Now
